message.content:
{"id": "49536", 
 "title": "If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404", 
 "description": "When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server responds with an HTTP code 200 OK but returns no content, instead of an HTTP error 404. This behavior occurs with the downloaded tomcat7.0.0beta package from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip.", 
 "OB": "Accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an expected HTTP error 404.", 
 "EB": "Accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed should return an HTTP error 404 instead of HTTP code 200 OK with no content.", 
 "SR": "Make sure that when a Tomcat 7 instance has no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, the server responds with an HTTP error 404. Testing should be performed using the tomcat7.0.0beta package downloaded from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '49536', 'title': 'Bug 49536If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404', 'description': 'Ali Tokmenhttp://ali.tokmen.com/ ', 'OB': '', 'EB': "HelloI've just downloaded http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zipIf I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps on it and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.CheersS. ", 'SR': "HelloI've just downloaded http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zipIf I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps on it and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.CheersS. "}
